title: Scrolling social media if there R usernames like Adullah with haram profiles, kufr? assim al hakeem
transcript: So uh when using social media users with names like that include Allah's names like Abdullah or Abd Rahman may simultaneously appear on the screen with things like non-Hijabi woman and etc. So my question is is if someone knows this and he's still using and scrolling on these apps is this an act of kufur? No it is not.
